name: Lin Aung
title: Senior Full Stack Developer
bio: Senior Fullstack Developer with 8+ years of experience specializing in Laravel, React, Node.js, and AI automation. Experienced in building enterprise CRM systems, AI-powered platforms, and scalable web applications serving thousands of daily users.

experience.description: Architected and deployed full-stack customer portal on existing CMS infrastructure, enabling self-service capabilities and improving customer experience. Developed and integrated intelligent AI agents across CMS platform to automate content processing, data extraction, and workflow orchestration. Engineered enterprise automation solutions using n8n across Microsoft 365 ecosystem (SharePoint, Outlook, OneDrive), streamlining cross-platform business processes. Deployed and maintained production server infrastructure within internal NAT environment, ensuring high availability and security compliance.

Developed core modules in Aptive's greenfield CRM system that have over 5000+ daily users. Developed comprehensive test suite, including integration, unit, and contract tests. Implemented critical features to address complex customer needs and improve user experience. Boosted application performance by 50% through strategic database query optimization.

Spearheaded management and maintenance of a diverse portfolio of 4-5 critical web applications. Leveraged Laravel and React to architect dynamic, responsive user interfaces. Collaborated closely with clients to translate business requirements into technical solutions. Demonstrated expertise in full-stack development, from backend logic to frontend design.

Successfully migrated Java API to PHP, enhancing system flexibility and maintainability. Integrated diverse global and local payment methods using Laravel 8, expanding market reach. Engineered a robust admin panel for e-commerce platform, significantly improving operational efficiency. Implemented MongoDB for optimized data management, boosting system performance.

projects.name: LearningFlowAI
projects.description: Built full-stack marketplace for AI workflow distribution with user authentication, payment processing, and content management. Forked and customized open-source LRS platform to track workflow usage and learning data.

projects.name: Aptive Environmental
projects.description: Developed and maintained a CRM project to handle over 5000+ daily users.

projects.name: Carzuno
projects.description: Drive more sales by revamping the UI and adding more quality of life features. Upgrade and maintain functionalities.

projects.name: Lazudi
projects.description: Redesigned search and home page interfaces for improved user engagement. Optimized background job schedulers and cron tasks for better performance. Implemented comprehensive SEO improvements including meta optimization and content structure.

projects.name: Vanango
projects.description: Revamped payment page UI to increase conversion rates and optimized checkout flow for better user experience. Enhanced SEO performance through strategic implementation of meta tags, headers, and structured data using proprietary SEO software.

projects.name: Servd
projects.description: Developed AWS-powered CRM with granular permissions for customers and admins. Migrated to Livewire for dynamic UI.

projects.name: ANIMEGASTORE
projects.description: Integrated payment gateways, upgraded PHP version, added new pages, and revamped UI for enhanced CRM user experience.

projects.name: JLPT N5 Vocabulary App
projects.description: Built a web app to help users learn and memorize JLPT N5 vocabulary.
